title: My account got ban for no reason
body: time to time i went into my account of NinjaKuri but somehow it is banned why?!?!

replies.body:
There are plenty of things that can get your account suspended. Toxicity, 3rd party applications, account sharing, boosting, and even sometimes locked for security reasons. 

You can [send in a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to discuss with a support agent why your particular account was banned. We are unable to help you further on the boards due to it being an account specific inquiry.
